description: Default EMQX Grafana Monitoring Dashboard Template

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: The value of run_queue_length can be used to evaluate the current Erlang scheduler load. If the value of run_queue_length is high, it means that there are many processes waiting to be executed in the run queue, and the scheduler may need more processor cores or a better scheduling strategy to better handle these processes
panels.title: Erlang VM Run Queue

list.description: A custom label of the scrape_config in prometheus to tag the cluster
list.name: cluster

title: EMQX
